long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color Picker Free is a Chrome extension designed to allow users to easily pick colors from any web page or outside of the web page. With its intuitive interface, users can extract and copy colors with precision, using a simple circle tool to select the desired color directly from the screen. The extension integrates the EyeDropper API to seamlessly capture colors and supports automatic copying of the selected color to the clipboard, providing an efficient and hassle-free experience for designers and developers alike. This tool is perfect for anyone looking to quickly capture and use colors during web browsing or development.
